content: Set up project structure in ~/code/tsaurus with backend and frontend directories
Set up Supabase project and configure PostgreSQL database
Initialize backend with Python + FastAPI + Supabase connection
Implement database models and API endpoints (families, chores, rewards)
Set up Next.js 14 + React + React Query + Tailwind frontend
Configure Shadcn/ui component library and Supabase client
Build authentication system with Supabase Auth
Create family registration and member management UI
Build family dashboard with real-time updates
Implement chore creation, assignment, and completion flows
Build reward creation and redemption system
Deploy to Railway.app with production configuration
Create comprehensive test suite (unit, integration, Puppeteer E2E)
Test complete user workflow end-to-end with 3 families
